statements: SELECT * FROM compost_quality_control;
SELECT id, testing_date, testing_result FROM compost_quality_control;
SELECT testing_result, maturity_level FROM compost_quality_control ORDER BY testing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_quality_control WHERE maturity_level > 3.5;
SELECT compost_batch_id, testing_result FROM compost_quality_control WHERE testing_result LIKE 'Pass%';
SELECT * FROM compost_quality_control WHERE maturity_level > 0.8;
SELECT compost_batch_id, testing_result FROM compost_quality_control WHERE testing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, maturity_level, testing_date FROM compost_quality_control ORDER BY testing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_quality_control WHERE testing_result = 'Passed' AND maturity_level < 0.7;
SELECT id, compost_batch_id, maturity_level, testing_date, testing_result FROM compost_quality_control ORDER BY maturity_level DESC, testing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity_levels;
SELECT maturity_level, date_recorded FROM compost_maturity_levels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, test_name, result FROM testing_results;
SELECT test_name, result, sample_id FROM testing_results WHERE result > 5;
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity_levels JOIN testing_results ON compost_maturity_levels.id = testing_results.sample_id;
SELECT maturity_level FROM compost_maturity_levels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, test_name, result FROM testing_results WHERE sample_id = 3;
SELECT id, maturity_level, date_recorded FROM compost_maturity_levels WHERE maturity_level LIKE 'High%';
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity_levels WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT test_name, result FROM testing_results WHERE result >= 8.0 ORDER BY result DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity;
SELECT id, maturity_level FROM compost_maturity ORDER BY maturity_level DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT maturity_level FROM compost_maturity;
SELECT test_date, test_result FROM compost_maturity WHERE maturity_level = 'High';
SELECT id, test_name, test_result FROM quality_control WHERE sample_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity WHERE maturity_level = 'High' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE test_name = 'Moisture Test' AND sample_id = 12345;
SELECT test_result, test_date FROM compost_maturity WHERE maturity_level = 'Low' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT report_date FROM reporting WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(*) FROM quality_control GROUP BY sample_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity_levels ORDER BY maturity_level DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE maturity_level_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, comments FROM quality_control WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT report_id, report_description, report_date FROM reporting WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT maturity_level, date_recorded FROM compost_maturity_levels WHERE maturity_level LIKE '%high%';
SELECT * FROM compost_maturity_levels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE maturity_level_id = 3 ORDER BY test_name DESC;
SELECT qc.record_id, qc.test_result, r.report_date FROM quality_control qc INNER JOIN reporting r ON qc.record_id = r.record_id WHERE qc.test_result = 'Failed';
SELECT cm.id, cm.maturity_level, r.report_description FROM compost_maturity_levels cm JOIN reporting r ON cm.id = r.record_id WHERE r.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT tr.test_id, tr.test_result, q.comments FROM test_results tr LEFT JOIN quality_control q ON tr.test_id = q.test_id WHERE q.comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM compost_levels;
SELECT maturity_level, test_result FROM compost_levels WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT tester_name, test_result FROM compost_tests JOIN testers ON compost_tests.tester_name = testers.tester_name WHERE test_type = 'Aerobic';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM compost_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT test_type_id, test_type_name, description FROM compost_test_types;
SELECT * FROM compost_levels WHERE maturity_level = 'High';
SELECT compost_id, test_result FROM compost_levels WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tester_name, department FROM testers WHERE department = 'Quality Assurance';
SELECT * FROM compost_test_types WHERE test_type_name LIKE '%Temperature%';
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_address FROM compost_locations WHERE location_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location_name DESC;
